metadata.summary: The episode dives into the latest happenings in the crypto world, including Bitcoin's new all-time high and Ethereum's growing institutional interest. It highlights key developments such as Base's new "everything app," the trend of Bitcoin miners viewing ETH as a treasury asset, and updates on macroeconomic factors. The discussion also touches on the Roman Storm trial and the implications of regulatory bills. The episode also covers the news of Tom Lee's goal of acquiring 5% of ETH supply.

topClaims.text: Tom Lee wants to buy 5% of all ETH supply, which is like 6 million ETH, and he is not anywhere close to that.
Bitcoin miners have to sell their ETH.
I'm very worried about crypto blowing up the entire economy, but the clarity bill could let companies opt out of SEC regulation.
The FBI broke down my door at 6:00 a.m. and took all of my computers and phones, looking for anything that could imply foul play.

topQuotes.text: We got another all-time high week back to back, but I do feel like all eyes are on ETH this week.
Bitcoin miners have to sell their ETH to pay for expenses because it's very competitive, very low margins.
I'm very worried about crypto blowing up the entire economy, but the clarity bill could let companies opt out of SEC regulation.
The FBI broke down my door at 6:00 a.m. and took all of my computers and phones, looking for anything that could imply foul play.

snippet.description:
📣SPOTIFY PREMIUM RSS FEED | USE CODE: SPOTIFY24
https://bankless.cc/spotify-premium

—-
We’re celebrating "Crypto Week" as declared by Trump amid the introduction of key regulatory bills.

But perhaps more importantly, Bitcoin's new all-time high, Ethereum's rising institutional interest, and Tom Lee's goal of acquiring 5% of ETH supply.

Highlights include Base's new "everything app," the trend of Bitcoin miners viewing ETH as a treasury asset, and updates on macroeconomic factors and the Roman Storm trial. This is the hottest news in crypto.

---
BANKLESS SPONSOR TOOLS:

🌐BINANCE | THE WORLDS #1 CRYPTO EXCHANGE

https://bankless.cc/coingecko
